General.Name: Shanghai GenTech Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai GenTech Co., Ltd. provides process critical system solutions to customers in hi-tech and advanced manufacturing industries in China. The company offers equipment and system integration process services covering design, manufacturing and installation to hi-tech industries, including IC, flat panel display, solar photovoltaics, LED, fiber optics, and bio-pharmaceutics. It also produces electronic materials used in silicon wafer epitaxial growth, solar photovoltaic cells, LED lighting, flat panel display, IC, and other industries. In addition, the company provides technical support and services for customers' system operation and management, as well as repair services. Further, it provides customers with regeneration and recycling solutions of recycling high-value products from waste through purification. Shanghai GenTech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
